This is a training program for bacterial whole-genome sequencing (WGS) scheduled from **July 29, 2024 to August 9, 2024**.

# Schedule

## Day 1 (29 July 2024)

Setting-up, introduction to command line interface (CLI).

## Day 2 (31 July 2024)

Quality checking and control, and species identification.

## Day 3 (02 August 2024)

Genome assembly, quality assessment and genome annotation.

## Day 4 (05 August 2024)

Antimicrobial resistance (AMR) gene, nd virulence factors identification, plasmid finding and multi-locus sequence typing (MLST).

## Day 5 (07 August 2024)

Comparative genomics (phylogenetic tree, pan- and core-genome analysis).

## Day 6

Report writing
